thread.title: Nike Unveils the All-New Aqua Sock 360
thread.title_full: Nike Unveils the All-New Aqua Sock 360

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Nike Unveils the All-New Aqua Sock 360
text:
Visit the original post to see all 2 images from this gallery. 
Brand: Nike
Model: Aqua Sock 360
Key Features: Slip-on design, Engineered Mesh upper, supportive external heel counter, flexible segmented sole unit.
Release Date: Available now.
Price: $71 USD
Availability: atmos 
Editor’s Notes: Nike has reimagined its old school water sport silhouette, the Aqua Sock, now dubbed the Aqua Sock 360. In evoking a familiar ’90s design aesthetic, the Swoosh has in turn chosen to go with a bright color option to introduce the new slip-on to the world.
Nike also just unveiled the Air Max LD Zero in a new summer-ready colorway. 
Subscribe to Highsnobiety’s sneaker chatbot on Facebook to receive lightning quick updates on release dates, sneaker street style, shopping tips and more.
